summary:
B.D.Y.E.B - Bro do you even Block Shield Mod.
Adds Custom Shields to Skyrim. They are on the leveled lists, you will find them in shops\Blacksmiths and being used by NPCs and baddies.
High Quality Meshes with 2K Textures
Various Themes
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16760-1-1430171592.png[/img][/center][center][img]http://static-7.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/19009-1-1430168597.png[/img]

[size=6]THANK YOU TO ALL THAT ENDORSED AND ENJOYED THE MOD
I CANNOT WORK ON MOD ANY LONGER
HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE FOR SOME TIME
MOD CREATORS ARE FREE TO USE MY MOD AS A RESOURCE
[/size][/center]
[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16760-2-1430170351.png[/img]

Custom shield mod for the aspiring Dovakhiin.

Aim of this mod is to both add variety to the shields in game and to Recreate some iconic shields from other Games / Movies / Series ect.

I try and make the Shields look "Lore friendly", by giving them a texture theme that fits within Skyrim.

The shields that I can't change to look lore friendly, I add as optional downloads.

Requests are welcome, depending on how the shield looks and how busy I am I might be able to do it.

[color=#dd9323][size=3]Please use the "BDYEB Requests" forum page to make Requests. [/size][/color]

After listening to the complaints and suggestions from my previous mod I created this mod.

I hope you all enjoy these shields as much as I enjoyed making them.

Please endorse if you do

[b][color=#bf9000][size=3]If you like the mod, Please Consider donating. [/size][/color][/b]

[color=#bf9000][size=5][b]PerMa Comparability and PaMa Patches[/b]
[/size][/color]Link to PCaPP : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59257/?]PCaPP[/url][color=#dd9323][size=6]
[/size][/color]
[b][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16760-5-1430170352.png[/img][/b]

[list][*] A Shield Mod that adds custom shields to the game
[*] Shields are completely new and made from scratch
[*] Shields have 2K / 2048 textures
[*] Shields Are Temparable - Meaning you can upgrade them at the Smith
[*] Shields are downloadable individually or as one package*
[*] They are added to leveled list, you will find them while exploring.
[*] They are NOT crafted
[/list][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16760-1-1430170351.png[/img][list][*]Bulwark of Azzinoth - World of Warcraft - Heavy Shield - Ebony
[*]Ebon Targaryen Shield - Game of Thrones - Heavy Shield - Ebony
[*]Shield of The Crusader - Oblivion Knights of the Nine - Heavy Shield - Ebony
[*]Old Shield of the Crusader - Oblivion Knights of the Nine - Heavy Shield - Ebony
[*]Orc Crescent Shield - Self Variation - Heavy Shield - Orcish
[*]Stark Shield - Game of Thrones - Heavy Shield - Iron
[*]Old Stark Shield - Game of Thrones - Heavy Shield - Iron
[*]Templar Shield - Self Variation - Heavy Shield - Iron
[*]Old Templar Shield - Self Variation - Heavy Shield - Iron
[*]Viking Boar Shield - Self Variation - Heavy Shield - Iron
[*]Viking Dragon Shield - Self Variation - Heavy Shield - Iron
[*]Viking Horse Shield - Self Variation - Heavy Shield - Iron
[*]Viking Plain Shield - Self Variation - Heavy Shield - Iron
[*]Viking Snake Shield - Self Variation - Heavy Shield - Iron
[*]Viking Spiral Shield - Self Variation - Heavy Shield - Iron
[*]Viking Wolf Shield - Self Variation - Heavy Shield - Iron
[*]Targaryen Shield - Game of Thrones - Light Shield - Elven
[*]Old Wood Shield - Self Variation - Light Shield - Hide
[*]Old Knight Shield - Self Variation - Light Shield - Hide
[*]Medium Buckler - Self Variation - Light Shield - Hide
[*]Leather Shield - Self Variation - Light Shield - Hide
[/list]
[center][color=#dd9323][size=6][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16760-1-1430170424.png[/img]

[/size][/color][youtube]sAxXUPAznTM[/youtube]
[youtube]jrS-uUcj-qY[/youtube]
[youtube]YpIzU0Hyvxg[/youtube]
[youtube]Fx8Pgh87PH8[/youtube]
[youtube]VfOUEh0FFZ8[/youtube][/center][center][/center]

[color=#dd9323][size=6]
[/size][/color][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16760-3-1430170351.png[/img]

If you want all the shields and don't want any hassle, Download the "All in one BDYEB with Single ESP"

If you want an easy download but don't want to use all the shields, Download the "All in one BDYEB with Separate ESPs"

Or you can just download each shield separately.

Hopefully now with all these options, EVERYONE is happy.

Have fun
[color=#dd9323][size=6]
[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16760-2-1430170405.png[/img][/size][/color]

1 - Choose Individual shield you want to download or download the all in one

2 - Use NMM (It should work without a problem)

Or - Extract the archives into the data folder, the archive is ready to just be extracted and everything should be in the correct place.

3 - Activate the Esp or Esps
*4 - If you use more than one of these shields or another similar mod, you need to use Wrye Bash \ Boss to create a bashed patch[color=#dd9323][size=6]

[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16760-4-1430170351.png[/img][/size][/color]

Q : Hey i have an idea for a shield!
A : Great! Please use the forum section of the mod named "BDYEB Requests". I do check there often and will credit you with the shield idea if i decide to make it.

Q : Is this Compatible with SkyRE, Requiem ect?
A : I don't know, i don't plan on adding an overhaul mod to my Skyrim, test it yourself or ask the author of that mod to make it compatible. I have ensured it be as compatible as possible by using stats similar to vanilla shields. WilliamImm Pointed out that i need to ensure the shields have the correct corresponding material, which i did do in Version 1.4. So just test it out and if it works, great.

Q : Hey why aren't the shields craft-able? I feel lazy and don't want to go look for them.
A : After Update 1.4 of BDYEB, you won't have a problem finding them. Not only are they on Baddies and some NPCs, but they will also be sold at Shopkeepers and Blacksmiths all over Skyrim.

Q: Why don't you make them craft-able?
A : Because the crafting station has become the "Mod Station" its where everyone goes to get the weapon\armor mods, it feels so disconnected from the game and so boring that i decided that i wouldn't do that. Instead i add to the game's shields, add more variation for the game to not only the player and his companions but also to the enemies.

Q : I like shield X but shield Y isn't lore friendly so i am not gonna download your mod.
A : I made Separate ESPs especially for this reason, I give YOU the choice, because my opinion of what is lore friendly won't be the same as yours, YOU can make it as lore friendly as YOU want. Don't make silly statements like this, because you will only look dumb.

Q : Can you please make a Lore friendly only pack?
A : See above. My opinion of what is lore friendly and what is not may differ from yours so no, i won't do that. shoo, go away.

Q : I have been killing loads and loads of bandits and stuff but i haven't found any of your shields. What the hell?
A : If you used the separate ESP versions or if you use another mod that adds shields to leveled list, Like Insanity's Shields , YOU MUST USE WRYE BASH. There is no other way around it.

Q : Hey i am using Dual Sheath Redux and with your mod i don't see the shields on my back!?
A : Make sure you have downloaded and installed the BDYEB DRS Compatibility patch, its in the downloads, go and get it.
[color=#dd9323][size=6]
[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16760-5-1430170405.png[/img][/size][/color]

Version 1.8

Added Alternative Shields for all town Guards

Version 1.7

Fixed Viking Wolf Texture problem

Version 1.6

Viking Boar Shield (Heavy)
Viking Dragon Shield (Heavy)
Viking Horse Shield (Heavy)
Viking Plain Shield (Heavy)
Viking Snake Shield (Heavy)
Viking Spiral Shield (Heavy)
Viking Wolf Shield (Heavy)

Version 1.5

Main Pack Shields added

Shield of The Crusader (Heavy) (Cixwow's Idea)
Old Shield of The Crusader (Heavy) (Cixwow's Idea)

Fixes

Fixed all shield Textures. Missing mip-maps were added. Should no Longer experience a game stutter\freeze when equipping shields.

Version 1.4

Shields added

Leather Shield (Light)

All in one Pack (Single ESP) Changes

Removed Templar Shield (Will be optional download)
Removed Old Templar Shield (Will be optional download)

Fixes

Fixed Shield Rarity, Adjusted the Leveled Lists.
Allowed Shop keepers and blacksmiths to sell the shields. (BlackSmith \ Shopkeepers leveled lists)
Fixed Bulark of Azzinoth in Game Spelling Error
Fixed Orc Crescent in Game Spelling Error
Fixed Shield Materials as to improve compatibility

Name Changes

Renamed Light Targaryen Shield to "Targaryen Shield"
Renamed Clean Stark to "Stark Shield"
Renamed Stark Rusted to "Old Stark Shield"
Renamed Clean Templar Shield to "Templar Shield"
Renamed Rusted Templar Shield to "Old Templar Shield"

Shield Rebalancing

Old Wood Shield = Hide Shield
Old Knight Shield = Hide Shield
Leather Shield = Hide Shield
Medium Buckler = Hide Shield
Targaryen Shield = Elven
Stark Shield = Iron
Old Stark Shield = Iron
Templar Shield = Iron
Old Templar Shield = Iron
Orc Crescent Shield = Orcish
Ebon Targaryen Shield = Ebony
Bulwark of Azzinoth = Ebony

Version 1.3

Added Compatibility for Dual Sheath redux

Aged Round Shield - Significantly reduced clipping
Bulwark of Azzinoth - Size reduced by 10% (Clipping)
Medium Buckler - Thickness increased by 70% Significantly reduced clipping
Old Knight Shield - Significantly reduced clipping
Orc Crescent Shield - Significantly reduced clipping
Stark Clean Shield - Significantly reduced clipping
Stark Rusted Shield - Significantly reduced clipping
Targaryen Clean - Significantly reduced clipping (Still have minor clipping with Daedric Gauntlets)
Targaryen Rusted - Significantly reduced clipping (Still have minor clipping with Deadric Gauntlets)
Templar Clean - Sized reduced by 10% , Thickness increased by 20% ,Significantly reduced clipping
Templar Rusted - Sized reduced by 10% , Thickness increased by 20% ,Significantly reduced clipping

Version 1.2

Orc Crescent Shield Added (Heavy)

Version 1.1

Fixed Targaryen Clean and Bulwark and Azzinoth bug where they did not display on Vampire Races
Medium Buckler Shield Added (Light)

Version 1.0

Initial release
Aged round shield (Light)
Bulwark of Azzinoth (Heavy)
Old Knight shield (Light)
Stark clean shield (Heavy)
Stark rusted shield (Heavy)
Targaryen clean shield (Light)
Targaryen rusted shield (Heavy)
Templar clean shield (Heavy)
Templar rusted shield (Heavy)
[color=#dd9323][size=6]
[/size][/color][center][color=#dd9323][size=6][b][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16760-3-1430170405.png[/img][/b][/size][/color]

The shields in the all in one and the shields that are separate have the same updates.
Separate shields have their individual shield revision numbers.
All in one version number is the revision number of the All in one pack.
*When you download the shields Separately, you have to combine them with Wrye Bash.


Traduzione italiana della mod per conto di Skyrim Chiama Italia disponibile al seguente link: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63369/?]LINK
[/url][color=#dd9323][size=6]
[b][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16760-4-1430170405.png[/img][/b]
[/size][/color]

Thank you to everyone that has downloaded and endorsed my mod
Appreciate all the positive feedback and suggestions.

Happy modding!

Malfazar

[img]http://cdn2-www.playstationlifestyle.net/assets/uploads/2011/02/Skyrim-Dragonborn-feature.jpg[/img][/center]
